rows.name: Low Blow!
rows.description: Gain 1 Stunned Condition. Pass a Simple Hard (-20) Endurance Test or gain another 2 Stunned Condition.

rows.name: Winded
rows.description: Gain 2 Stunned Conditions. Pass a Simple Average (+20) Endurance Test, or gain the Prone Condition. Movement is halved for 1d10 Rounds as you get your breath back.

rows.name: Bruised
rows.description: All Agility-based Tests suffer a -10 penalty for 1d10 days.

rows.name: Cracked Bone
rows.description: Gain a Stunned Condition. All Tests suffer a -10 penalty until you receive a successful Heal Test.

rows.name: Gaping Wound
rows.description: Gain 3 Bleeding Conditions. Any Wounds you receive to the affected Hit Location will inflict an additional Bleeding Condition for the next week as the cut reopens.

rows.name: Painful Cut
rows.description: Gain 2 Bleeding Conditions and a Stunned Condition. Pass a Simple Hard (-20) Endurance Test or gain the Unconscious Condition as you blackout from the pain.

rows.name: Fractured Bone
rows.description: Gain a Stunned Condition. Pass a Simple Endurance Test or also gain the Prone Condition. All Tests suffer a -10 penalty for the next 4 weeks.

rows.name: Flensed Muscle
rows.description: Gain 4 Bleeding Conditions. Any Wounds you receive to the affected Hit Location will also inflict 2 Bleeding Conditions as the tears reopen for the next 4 weeks.

rows.name: Crippling Wound
rows.description: Gain a Prone Condition that can only be removed with a successful Simple Heal Test. All Tests suffer a -20 penalty until you receive this medical treatment and spend at least a week resting.

rows.name: Shattered Bone
rows.description: Gain a Stunned Condition that can only be removed with a successful Simple Heal Test. All Tests suffer a -20 penalty until you receive this medical attention, and spend at least a week resting.

rows.name: Ruined
rows.description: Gain the Unconscious Condition that can only be removed with a successful Simple Heal Test. The affected Hit Location is useless until you spend a month on bed rest.

rows.name: Torn Apart
rows.description: You are hacked in two. Your top half lands 1d10 feet in a random direction and all nearby Characters are showered in blood.
